page.title: 01General Description
page.content: General Description of our 12Km squares Our Domesday Survey area is divided by the M25 motorway which runs across our rectangle from east to west.The main east coast railway from London to Scotland runs from north to south across our allocated area. In the north-west corner of our area lies part of Potters Bar.This area is virtually all taken up with owner-occupier housing. The southern part of our rectangle contains Hadley Wood.This is a suburb of London.The houses here are very expensive to buy.Between Potters Bar and Hadley Wood lies a band of farmland.This land is part of London's "Green Belt".Included in this "Green Belt"land is the Wrotham Park estate. This old 18th century mansion and its park cover approx.two 1Km.squares.
